sentences.sContent: I was beguiled by the romance and exotic atmosphere of the souks in Marrakech.
sentences.sCn: 我被马拉喀什剧场浪漫的异国情调迷住了。

synos.tran: 欺骗；使着迷；轻松地消磨

remMethod.val: be + guile (欺诈) → 欺骗 → 诱骗

words.tran: 欺骗的；消遣的；令人陶醉的
欺骗；使愉快地度过；迷住（beguile的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 欺骗；使着迷；轻松地消磨
trans.tranOther: to persuade or trick someone into doing something
